overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a well-engaged social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a focus on academic and professional topics related to disinformation and computational social science. The content receives varied engagement, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction rates, especially for announcements regarding research and job opportunities.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to studies on disinformation and coordinated inauthentic behavior across social media.
Announcements about job openings and research grants.
Posts discussing upcoming conferences and presentations on social media analysis.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts related to research findings to maintain and boost engagement.
Engage more with followers through comments and discussions to deepen community interaction, especially on Bluesky and Mastodon.
